events.message: We have successfully received your application for the senior software engineer position and look forward to reviewing your experience and skills.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your background as a software developer with relevant skills.
A recruiter from our technical hiring team has been assigned to your application to guide you through the upcoming steps in the hiring process.
The initial screening interview has been completed successfully, and your technical expertise aligns well with the role requirements.
Thank you for promptly responding to the screening feedback and confirming your availability for the next technical interview stage.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our lead developer and is set for May 10th at 2 PM UTC via video call.
You have successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and solid coding proficiency.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 14th at 10 AM UTC to discuss your career goals, benefits, and company culture fit.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and the team was impressed with your communication skills and enthusiasm for the role.
We are excited to extend you a formal job offer for the senior software engineer position including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer; we are glad the terms meet your expectations and look forward to your response.
You have officially accepted our offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you onboard as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun, and you will receive all necessary resources and introductions to integrate smoothly with the engineering department.
The recruitment case is now closed with a successful hire, marking the start of your new role and future contributions to the software development team.
